replies.body: I do hope they bring URF back during april :)
No offence rito but nemesis draft, I think, was a flunk
It needed something else, just another variable to keep the intrigue.
Still waiting for URF to come back it is the best game mode of lol history next is the Poro king I loved that.

Worst Game Mode Riot has ever created!!! {{champion:17}} even worst then Teemo. GG!!! I'm going to {{summoner:12}} my self out of here so I can {{summoner:7}} and find some {{summoner:13}} cause RITO! {{summoner:3}} 's me to the max.
You know, you *could* just *not play* that mode.

need a game mode where everyone spawns at lvl 18 with 10k gold, and the game goes from there.
but with regular spawn times that change the longer the game goes.
need a game mode where everyone spawns at lvl 18 with 10k gold, and the game goes from there.

Riot please this nemesis draft is so bad it gives me aids and cancer please bring URF back, and this game is so unbalanced please NERF {{champion:75}} and {{champion:7}} I am actually going to uninstall soon please make the game better so bad.
Tbh I hate that no ones playing this mode anymore or more frequent I like it coz it gives us chance to adapt to other champion play styles........PS giving Rengar a new skin Pliz Riot

This game mode was so rage worthy, because of all the underestimations on everybody. People pick OP champs like Nunu for the other team, and ban champs that are actually really good.

However, it was really fun to see how some of the less played champs worked out and there was some unexpected synergy between a lot of the champ, like Morg and Nunu ult together.

Overall, I think that it was a really fun game mode.
